lom:description.lom:string: This site provides a preview of the Planet Earth Science Series, which is a commercial software program in which students use satellite observations of the Earth and data from climate models to study the Earth as a system of interacting components through a series of virtual research expeditions. The site also contains links to other educational sites on El NiÃƒÂ±o and the Antarctic Ozone Hole.

lom:title.lom:string: Planet Earth Science Inc.: Educational Software Developer
